description: Order search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

items.description: Order interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.
